name: CraftJam4 - Roikku's Concept
description:
This is Roikku's (LakeDead) submission for Craft Jam 4. It's currently just a concept and tech demo. We'll see if it ever grows into a more complete game.

All art and assets made by LakeDead. All audio made by or licensed for LakeDead.

Screenshots from development. Not everything still remains in the game or is the same.

The game may have framerate issues, but I believe that's due to the fact that the game room is like 50,000 x 50,000, and there's like 1,000 objects spawned into the room, and that it's drawing the view in 1920x1080. Using smaller number in all of those most likely boosts performance. But this is how it is now.
